info.name: DDT using POSTMAN
info.description:
This collection demonstrates **Data Driven Testing (DDT)** in Postman using a CSV/JSON data file.

It executes the Google Search API (`https://www.google.com/search?q={{number}}`) for numbers **1 to 10**, verifying that each request is successful and logging which number was searched.

The test cases validate response status codes and ensure the response contains the searched number.EndFragment

request.description:
Validate Google search results for numbers 1–10 using DDT in Postman

**Test Steps:**

1. Send `GET https://www.google.com/search?q={{number}}`
    
2. Iterate through values 1–10 using CSV/JSON data file
    
3. Validate response status code
    
4. Log searched number in test results
    
5. Verify response body contains searched number
    

**Expected Result:**

- Each request returns **200 OK**
    
- Test results clearly show which number was searched
